title: U.S. Special Forces Want to Use Deepfakes for Psy-ops
description:
The U.S. government spent years warning deepfakes could destabilize democratic societies.

title: U.S. Embassy in Niger Threatens a Pesky American Journalist and Then Backs Down
description:
In Niger, going to jail is often a death sentence, especially if you’re an activist or a journalist.

The post U.S. Embassy in Niger Threatens a Pesky American Journalist and Then Backs Down appeared first on The Intercept.
